summary: Gluten is a protein found in wheat, barley, rye, and some oats. It gives dough its stretchy texture and helps bread rise. Gluten makes up most of the protein in wheat. Some people can't eat gluten because it makes them sick. This is called celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. They have to follow a special diet without gluten. Other grains like corn and rice don't have gluten and are safe for them.
title: Gluten
